body:
Well it's been quite a while since my last AMA, so I'm making this post!

Throw your questions
body_tagged:
Well it's been quite a while since my last AMA, so I'm making this post!

Throw your questions

replies.body: Would you rather run face-first max speed into a pole in front of everyone or crawl all day at school? This includes in hallways, at break, going to and from school.
replies.body_tagged: Would you rather run face-first max speed into a pole in front of everyone or crawl all day at school? This includes in hallways, at break, going to and from school.

replies.body:
Bastante contento, ya que mucha gente me habia dicho que me lo merecia. 

Espero que podamos ganarlo.

Me caes muy bien como persona, despues de tanto tiempo aun seguimos hablando. Como jugador hace mucho que no te veo.

replies.body:
You seem like a nice, fun guy. However, I haven't talked much with you yet.

Argentina.

Blue.

I don't have a favourite one from public matches, but from competitive I like Wahiz for CTW and Crossfire for TDM.

On Avicus, I prefer CTW, but on OCN I prefer DTC.

A burger with fries I think.

I don't have a favourite one from public matches, but from competitive I like Wahiz for CTW and Crossfire for TDM.

On Avicus, I prefer CTW, but on OCN I prefer DTC.

A burger with fries I think.

replies.body: Ya van como año y medio desde la primera vez que hablamos, y siempre me cague de risa con vos. Una lastima que ya no hablemos casi nada :c. Como jugador creo que siempre fuiste bueno a espada, y a arco nunca te vi. Rusheando la carreabas en CTW en los viejos tiempos.

replies.body:
Fine, and you?

It's pretty neat, however as i'm a junior mod sometimes is a little exhausting having to record and freeze the hacker and waiting for a mod.

You seem to be a very nice and helpful guy. I haven't talked with you in TS yet, so I can't give a proper opinion yet.

Fui referido.

Bastante bien, es divertido poder castigar a los que rompen las reglas en vez de que me molesten y no poder hacer nada. Tambien otra cosa que me gusta mucho es ayudar a la gente.

No lo se, ahora mismo estoy concentrado en pasar mi trial.

replies.body: Very good player, you're very good in both sword and bow. As a person, you're also great, you're always there when I need anything. I appreciate you a lot.
replies.body_tagged: Very good player, you're very good in both sword and bow. As a person, you're also great, you're always there when I need anything. I appreciate you a lot.

reply_to.body: Opinion??
reply_to.body_tagged: Opinion??

replies.body:
We have a pretty strong roster, hopefully we'll do pretty good in the tm. Also it's pretty funny to play with the team and joke around xd. Also it opened me some doors. I would not be a junior mod, no one would even know me, and I would still get nervous when talking English.

You are very good at sword, but I haven't seen you shooting yet. You have a good communication. I haven't seen any weakness on you as of now.
replies.body_tagged:
We have a pretty strong roster, hopefully we'll do pretty good in the tm. Also it's pretty funny to play with the team and joke around xd. Also it opened me some doors. I would not be a junior mod, no one would even know me, and I would still get nervous when talking English.

You are very good at sword, but I haven't seen you shooting yet. You have a good communication. I haven't seen any weakness on you as of now.

replies.body:
You are a great guy, very friendly. As a player I don't know much of you but you seem to cope very good with your lag.

In 5000k million years when the sun dies. 

A server who may be dying in the eyes of some, but it is just borning in mines.

Argentina.

English. It's great practice for me speaking English every day. Over the last months I've improved a lot. Also I don't need to practice Spanish. But I have very clear in my mind that English will be much more useful for me in my life than Spanish.

replies.body:
Como desde el bttc que nos conocemos y siempre me caiste bien. Hubo un tiempo en el que no hablamos mucho, pero por suerte ahora hablamos bastante. 
Como jugador me pareces buen cañonero, pero deberias mejorar con espada y arco, serías un jugador muchísimo más completo.

reply_to.body: Opionion sobre mi?
reply_to.body_tagged: Opionion sobre mi?

replies.body: You are one of the people I appreciate the most here in Avicus. You have helped me a lot since i joined ppb. I really have to thank you for everything you've done for me. As a player I can't really give an opinion, but basing on your experience you should be a very good one.
replies.body_tagged: You are one of the people I appreciate the most here in Avicus. You have helped me a lot since i joined ppb. I really have to thank you for everything you've done for me. As a player I can't really give an opinion, but basing on your experience you should be a very good one.

reply_to.body:
I really do not like the question about asking for opinions on myself because I never really care but...
Opinions on me?
reply_to.body_tagged:
I really do not like the question about asking for opinions on myself because I never really care but...
Opinions on me?

replies.body:
As a person I can't give an opinion since I have not ever talked with you. As a player, I think you are very good with the bow and good with the sword. 

Grim has improved a lot during last months and from the members I know I can say you're very friendly and nice. 

Apollo has always been ateam which stands between the top 5 in tournaments. However, I haven't seen an improvement lately. I think that you could get better results in TDM if you focused more on your pvp and organisation. As people I would same pretty much the same than with Grim.

I think it could be either won by PPB, BC, ETCR or any other ocn teams if they practiced. However I don't know how ETCR will do with a different leader. 

SOC will be won by Street Sharks probably, with pb, starbeans/uber and tribal in top 4.
replies.body_tagged:
As a person I can't give an opinion since I have not ever talked with you. As a player, I think you are very good with the bow and good with the sword. 

Grim has improved a lot during last months and from the members I know I can say you're very friendly and nice. 

Apollo has always been ateam which stands between the top 5 in tournaments. However, I haven't seen an improvement lately. I think that you could get better results in TDM if you focused more on your pvp and organisation. As people I would same pretty much the same than with Grim.

I think it could be either won by PPB, BC, ETCR or any other ocn teams if they practiced. However I don't know how ETCR will do with a different leader. 

SOC will be won by Street Sharks probably, with pb, starbeans/uber and tribal in top 4.
